title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Go CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list, delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models as LLMs and embedders for chains, agents, RAG, and more.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI); supports RAG, multimodal, admin panel, user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous/asynchronous APIs and Kotlin coroutines support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, copy, delete models with idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and key bindings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local AI autocomplete and chat powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedding components for production pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection friendly design.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image (ollama/ollama) with CUDA and CPU variants for running models in containers.

title: ollama-rag-py
summary: Minimal Python template showing RAG with Ollama, ChromaDB, and LangChain for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension for chatting with any local Ollama model inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official NPM package providing typed JS/TS bindings to the Ollama REST API with zero runtime dependencies.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package offering Pythonic sync/async clients for chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate exposing strongly-typed async functions for chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry documentation listing all supported models (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.) and their pull tags.
